outboundReferences.contextLine: Notes are simple text files with some extra flavor, in the shape of Markdown syntax and support for extra properties (see [[note-properties]]).
- the title of a note (e.g. in the [[graph-visualization]]) is given by precedence based on:
This is a wikilink (aka internal link) to [[note-properties]].

inboundReferences.contextLine: - the `title` property will assign the name to the note that you will see in the graph, regardless of the filename or the first heading (also see how to [[write-notes-in-foam]])
